attributes.action: ban The Jeremy Kyle Show on the grounds of public decency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The programme has been called into question for its manipulation and public humiliation of its guests and their families, many of whom have mental health issues or, at the very least, extremely distressing lives. 

It creates a negative picture of British life and encourages a callous and judgmental approach which is at odds with Government aims to create a cohesive society.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
